ci_support_linux_64_cuda_compiler_versio:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cuda_compiler:
- cuda-nvcc
cuda_compiler_version:
- '12.9'
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libboost_devel:
- '1.86'
libboost_headers:
- '1.86'
libboost_python_devel:
- '1.86'
librdkit_dev:
- 2024.9.6
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
  - c_stdlib_version
  - cuda_compiler_version

about.description:
nvMolKit is a CUDA-backed python library for accelerating common RDKit molecular operations.
nvMolKit links to RDKit and nvMolKit operations work on RDKit RDMol objects.
about.summary: nvMolKit is a CUDA-backed python library for accelerating common RDKit molecular operations

about.description:
nvMolKit is a CUDA-backed python library for accelerating common RDKit molecular operations.
nvMolKit links to RDKit and nvMolKit operations work on RDKit RDMol objects.
about.summary: nvMolKit is a CUDA-backed python library for accelerating common RDKit molecular operations

about.description:
nvMolKit is a CUDA-backed python library for accelerating common RDKit molecular operations.
nvMolKit links to RDKit and nvMolKit operations work on RDKit RDMol objects.
about.summary: nvMolKit is a CUDA-backed python library for accelerating common RDKit molecular operations

name: nvmolkit
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: "0.3.0"

package:
  name: "nvmolkit"
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/NVIDIA-Digital-Bio/nvMolKit/archive/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b0d9922c9f384e557bef9281e5fd2de4687be16e7bfb3f07be169a4a031a9ab0

build:
  number: 1
  skip:
    - osx
    - win
    - cuda_compiler_version == "None"
requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cuda') }}
    - cmake >=3.30
    - make
  host:
    - cuda-version ${{ cuda_compiler_version }}.*
    - cuda-cudart-dev
    - cuda-nvtx-dev
    - eigen
    - libboost-devel
    - libboost-headers
    - libboost-python-devel
    - libcublas-dev
    - libcurand-dev
    - libcusolver-dev
    - libgomp
    - librdkit-dev ==${{ librdkit_dev }}
    - pip
    - python
    - rdkit
    - scikit-build
    - setuptools
  run:
    - numpy
    - python
    - pytorch
    - rdkit ==${{ librdkit_dev }}

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - nvmolkit

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/NVIDIA-Digital-Bio/nvMolKit
  summary: nvMolKit is a CUDA-backed python library for accelerating common RDKit molecular operations
  description: |
    nvMolKit is a CUDA-backed python library for accelerating common RDKit molecular operations.
    nvMolKit links to RDKit and nvMolKit operations work on RDKit RDMol objects.
  license_file: LICENSE/License.txt
  license: Apache-2.0

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - evasnow1992
    - scal444
